text: The Rio Tapajós saki or Gray's bald-faced saki (Pithecia irrorata) is a species of saki monkey, a type of New World monkey, from South America. It is found in parts of western Brazil, southeastern Peru and possibly northern Bolivia. == References == Rio Tapajós saki Category:Mammals of Bolivia Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Mammals of Peru Rio Tapajós saki
title: Rio Tapajós saki
